transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, mam good evening Ilma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji, actually aapse baat hui thi IndiaMART se aapne mail kiya tha hume.
Customer: Feedback mail kiya tha.
Customer: Aha.
Executive: Haan, ki sir kuch conversion nahi aa raha hai aur leads nahi aa rahi hai. Kya problem aa rahi hai sir leads mein?
Customer: Lead apna jo listing ka product hai usi ka koi lead hi nahi aa raha hai. Transportation ka lead aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha. Aap jisme deal karte ho usme leads nahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi apna profile jo bheja hai, hum log jo product bheja hai upload kar rahe hai product listing ka aap isko enrich karte hai ki nahi? Jaise customer upload kiya aise hi chhod deta hai kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye hum usme customer ka verify karte hai ki kya kya customer ka matlab hai details wo verify hum karte hai. But sir per person nahi kar paate but ha clients ka sara verify hota hai ki usme GST ye ye sari detail dali hai ki nahi dali hai sir.
Customer: Lekin mai ye kya baat kar raha hu madam aap kya baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Hum log yahi puch rahe hai hum log do teen product hum log add kiya hai. Thik hai aapka portal mein. Achcha aapne product add kiya hai. Usme kar diya. Haan. Usi product ko agar aapki aawaz mujhe itni dheere aa rahi hai na ki mai aapki aawaz properly sun nahi pa rahi hu isiliye mujhe thoda miscommunication ho raha hai aapse.
Customer: Nahi abhi jo hum log product usme add kar rahe hai na usko aap enrich karte hai ki nahi? Matlab ki isme product ka proper quality achchi
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting leads for listed products.

- Enquires if IndiaMART enriches product listings.



Resolution:

- Executive stated they verify customer details.

- Executive mentioned verifying GST and other details.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product listing, verification, gst
